data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 10978, Version Hash: 2a9b86cbc2710122dff6ced3e6145beac91d07b9
data.actual_result: Although slider shows user volume as where you left it, it'll play at 100% anyways
data.expected_result: User volume should be the same as the slider
data.short_description: Discord User Volume not persistent on reload, although slider shows it is
data.steps_to_repro: - Get either somebody talking constantly at a constant volume or a music bot (music bot preferred) - Join same voice channel as that person/bot - Make them start making a constant noise at constant volume - Right click name and adjust user volume lower, for example, 5% (not tested on higher percents) - Reload/restart Discord (CTRL+R) - Rejoin voice channel if you aren't in it - Observe that user volume slider is where you left it, but the user/bot sounds as if they're at 100%
